description: Actors with known movie relationships for testing cast/filmography features

actors.name: Christopher Nolan
actors.bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is a British-American filmmaker known for his cerebral, non-linear narratives.
actors.note: Often works as both director and writer

actors.name: Matt Damon
actors.bio: Matthew Paige Damon is an American actor, producer, and screenwriter.

actors.name: Anne Hathaway
actors.bio: Anne Jacqueline Hathaway is an American actress known for her versatile roles in both blockbusters and independent films.

actors.name: Michael Caine
actors.bio: Sir Michael Caine CBE is an English actor, known for his distinctive Cockney accent.

actors.name: Jessica Chastain
actors.bio: Jessica Michelle Chastain is an American actress and producer known for her feminist themes.
